title: "Computer Vision System Allows Analysis of Microscopy Videos"
excerpt: "Researchers have developed a system based on computer vision techniques that allows automatic analysis of biomedical videos captured by microscopy in order to characterise and describe the behaviour of the cells that appear in the images."
